title: Breaking Bad
description: Breaking Bad is the story of a high school chemistry teacher who turns to crime after being diagnosed with terminal lung cancer. The show aired on AMC from 2008 to 2013

title: Stranger Things
description: Stranger Things is a supernatural action-drama series set in the fictional town of Hawkins, Indiana, during the 1980s, where a group of young friends uncover a government conspiracy and supernatural forces after a boy vanishes, leading to a series of extraordinary mysteries

title: Lost
description: The plot of the TV series Lost follows the story of survivors from Oceanic Flight 815, a plane that crashes on a mysterious tropical island in the South Pacific, as they struggle to survive while uncovering the island's secrets, including the presence of a hidden community known as The Others and the island's supernatural elements, all while exploring the complex backstories of each individual survivor through flashbacks

title: Game of Thrones
description: Game of Thrones is a fantasy series that follows the power struggle between noble families in Westeros and Essos. The series explores complex moral dilemmas, power dynamics, and the nature of leadership.

title: Westworld
description: The HBO series Westworld is about a futuristic amusement park where guests can live out their fantasies without consequences. The park is populated by androids called hosts who are programmed not to harm humans. However, the hosts begin to exhibit aberrant behavior.

title: Person of Interest
description: A reclusive billionaire programmer, Harold Finch, who uses a powerful AI called The Machine to predict and prevent violent crimes, teaming up with a former CIA agent, John Reese, to investigate the people of interest identified by the AI

title: Banshee
description: Banshee follows an ex-con who, after serving 15 years, assumes the identity of a murdered sheriff in the small town of Banshee, Pennsylvania, to find his former lover and partner in crime, now living under an assumed identity.

title: 3 Body Problem
description: The series portrays a fictional past, present, and future wherein Earth encounters an alien civilization from a nearby system of three Sun-like stars orbiting one another, a representative example of the three-body problem in orbital mechanics.

title: The Boys
description: The Boys is set in a universe where super-powered individuals are recognized as heroes by the general public and work for a powerful corporation known as Vought International, which markets and monetizes them. Outside of their heroic personas, most are arrogant, selfish, and corrupt.
